description: Shopee Open Platform documentation for developers serving Shopee sellers with ecommerce needs

main_features.name: Comprehensive developer services

main_features.name: Management Features
items: Access Open API testing tools, test accounts and sandbox environments

user_types.description: Comprehensive range of Open APIs for software businesses covering shop operations, marketing, and more
For sellers wanting to develop tailored software and integrate systems for operations optimization and data management

notes: This appears to be the introduction page of Shopee Open Platform documentation. It contains overview information rather than specific API endpoint details. The page includes sections about platform benefits, user types, and main features. Navigation menu on the left shows various documentation sections including API calls, Authentication, and other technical documentation.
